org.appspot.apprtc

Class TCPChannelClient.TCPSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.appspot.apprtc.TCPChannelClient.TCPSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TCPChannelClient.TCPSocketClient, TCPChannelClient.TCPSocketServer
    Enclosing class:
    TCPChannelClient

    private abstract class TCPChannelClient.TCPSocket
extends java.lang.Thread
    Base class for server and client sockets. Contains a listening thread that will call eventListener.onTCPMessage on new messages.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Closes the rawSocket if it is still open. Also fires the onTCPClose event.

      • send

        public void send(java.lang.String message)
        Sends a message on the socket. Should only be called on the executor thread.
